de.bioforscher.singa.structure.model.interfaces

Interface Chain

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AtomContainer, LeafSubstructureContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MmtfChain, OakChain

    public interface Chain
extends LeafSubstructureContainer
    Chains that represent one continuous macro molecule (most often the biggest macro molecules and its ligands are collected in one model). Chains contain LeafSubstructures that in tun contain Atoms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      default java.lang.String flatToString() 
      java.lang.String getChainIdentifier()
      Returns the chain identifier, a short sequence of alphabetic characters.
      Chain getCopy()
      Returns a copy of this chain.
